verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:20
verses.text: And David took all the flocks and the herds, which they drave before those other cattle, and said, This is David’s spoil.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:21
verses.text: And David came to the two hundred men, which were so faint that they could not follow David, whom they had made also to abide at the brook Besor: and they went forth to meet David, and to meet the people that were with him: and when David came near to the people, he saluted them.
